message: Let's make a deal. I believe this is a fair split considering the circumstances.
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor, Alice. Let's find a compromise. This offer accounts for the time pressure while being fairer to both of us.
Bob, we're running out of time. This offer is my compromise - it's better for you than what you'll get if we wait longer.
Alice, we need to settle this soon. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. This is a fair deal considering the time constraint.
Bob, time is really of the essence now. This is my final offer, it's a reasonable compromise given the decreasing value of the money.
